        public AuthorizeResponse authorize(String app_id,
                          String app_key,
                          String referrer,
                          HashMap<String,String> usage_metrics)
                            throws ApiException
        Fetch the current statistics for an application, using an app_id.
        Specified by:
        authorize in interface Api2
        Parameters:
        app_id - Application id (or null)
        app_key - Optional Application Key (or null)
        referrer - Optional referrer ip address (or null)'
        usage_metrics - Optional set of key:value pairs of metrics to be checked @return AuthorizeResponse containing the current usage metrics.
        Returns:
        AuthorizeResponse containing the current usage metrics.
        Throws:
        ApiException - if there is an error connection to the server
